H1.text: who was the first british team to win the european cup. Manchester United

H2.text: who was the first british team to win the european cup. Nottingham Forest

H3.text: who was the first british team to win the european cup. Celtic

A4.text: Celtic became the first British team to win the European Cup in 1967.

A5.text: Celtic defeated Inter Milan 2–1 at the Estádio Nacional in Lisbon on 25 May 1967 to become the first British team to win the European Cup.
